name: Ecma International
goal: Create and maintain Standards in the area of Information Technology, Telecommunication Technology and Consumer Electronics
interests: Communication, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Environment, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: ICT Standardisation policy multi-stakeholder platform. This platform is operated by DG GROW and DG CONNECT. Members are the Member States and the various standardization organization or ICT related interest groups. Ecma is one of the standardization organizations, founded in 1961 in Geneva, Switzerland.
